text:
[Verse]
Staring up at stars
Wishing we were there
Life on Mars is calling
Feel it in the air

[Verse 2]
Dusty red horizons
Alien skies so wide
We could build a future
On this Martian ride

[Chorus]
Life on Mars
Be the one to dream
Life on Mars
In the red sunbeam

[Verse 3]
Footprints in the soil
Breaking new frontiers
Step by step we wander
Casting off our fears

[Verse 4]
Rockets in the distance
Journey to the known
Together we'll discover
A place to call our own

[Chorus]
Life on Mars
Be the one to dream
Life on Mars
In the red sunbeam
title: Life on Mars
